<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 259 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This potion appears to shift colors, and no two observers describe it in the same way. When consumed, it attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) all curses and diseases affecting you, as well as the blinded and deafened conditions from spells affecting you. The potion has a counteract rank of 7th and a +20 modifier for the roll.
